title: The completion of IH tenements under the said Scheme, along with necessary particulars, including a copy of the Occupation Certificate granted by the Planning Authority in respect thereof, shall be immediately intimated by the Landowner/Developer to concerned department of MCGM
clause_text: The completion of IH tenements under the said Scheme, along with necessary particulars, including a copy of the Occupation Certificate granted by the Planning Authority in respect thereof, shall be immediately intimated by the Landowner/Developer to concerned department of MCGM. The disbursement of such 20 % IH tenements shall be as under:
